1142910.name: Cuisine Royale - Advanced Pack
1142910.description:
Get everything you need to start the game successfully with one purchase!

Includes:

  • The Weird West Stories book;
  • Highlander Suit;
  • Cabaret Dancer Suit;
  • Plague Doctor mask;
  • 2500 Golden Crowns.

With the Weird West Stories book you will immediately get two unique outfits, and XP booster, also open access to the creation of other unique items in the workshop.

With the Weird West Stories book, speed of creating new items is significantly increased, also you will get:

  • Two times more rewards for each completed challenge for two months!
  • +50% (and up to 150% with additional items from workshop) bonus to the experience you will receive in battles!

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Royal Bucks, which can be spent to unlock items in the workshop.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available for Windows only. You can't activate this item for the Xbox Live account.
1142910.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 法语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
